div.p: Mapeamento de Heart Rate Variability ValueSet para LOINC Observation Codes for Lifestyle Medicine
Grupo 1 Mapeamento de Heart Rate Variability CodeSystem to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

tr.td: hrv-sdnn (HRV SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals))
Confirmed LOINC code for SDNN, created in LOINC v2.72 (June 2022). Time-domain HRV measure representing total variability.
hrv-rmssd (HRV RMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences))

No LOINC code available as of November 2024. RMSSD is the primary parasympathetic marker recommended by HRV Task Force 1996. Submission recommended to LOINC committee. NOTE: Apple HealthKit mislabels this as 'SDNN' (HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateVariabilitySDNN) - implementers should be aware of this vendor-specific naming error.
hrv-pnn50 (HRV pNN50 (Percentage of NN intervals >50ms difference))
No LOINC code available as of November 2024. High correlation with RMSSD (r>0.90), parasympathetic marker. Percentage of successive NN intervals differing by more than 50ms.
hrv-lf-hf-ratio (HRV LF/HF Ratio (Low Frequency to High Frequency ratio))
No LOINC code available as of November 2024. Autonomic balance indicator, though clinical interpretation is debated. Ratio of LF power (0.04-0.15 Hz) to HF power (0.15-0.4 Hz).
hrv-lf-power (HRV LF Power (Low Frequency power 0.04-0.15 Hz))
No LOINC code available as of November 2024. Low frequency spectral power (0.04-0.15 Hz). Reflects both sympathetic and parasympathetic modulation, with some baroreflex contribution.
hrv-hf-power (HRV HF Power (High Frequency power 0.15-0.4 Hz))
No LOINC code available as of November 2024. High frequency spectral power (0.15-0.4 Hz). Reflects parasympathetic (vagal) modulation, synchronized with respiratory rhythm.

title.value: Heart Rate Variability to LOINC Mapping

description.value: Operational ConceptMap for HRV terminology translation. Enables runtime $translate operations for semantic interoperability between custom HRV codes and LOINC standard terminology.

purpose.value: Provides semantic mappings from custom HRV metrics to standard LOINC codes where available, with migration path for future LOINC assignments. Critical for wearable device data integration into EHR systems.

display.value: HRV SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals)

comment.value: Confirmed LOINC code for SDNN, created in LOINC v2.72 (June 2022). Time-domain HRV measure representing total variability.
